name: Domino Runner
description:
A game made for the Azure Lux Game Jam

Theme: CHAIN REACTION

A game about Dominos and Robots. Even if you tip only one domino, the rest will fall and form a chain reaction of robots chasing you!

Controls:

- move: hold the left mouse

- Attack: right-click

- Pause: escape key

Goal: Find the fastest way to enter the elevator and compete in the online leaderboard!

Notes:

- For some reason, Webgl doesn't identify unique devices, if you want to compete with the leaderboard please download the Windows version thank you!

Assets:

3D models and animation - Luunquoal (Instagram)

Sound effects and BGM - Fabian/Nyon (Website) (Twitter)

UI [Free] - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/dark-theme-ui-199010

Library used:

Lean Tween: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/leantween-3595

Fog Shader: https://www.lmhpoly.com/tutorials/unity-urp-tutorial-orthographic-fog-plane-shad...

WebGL template: https://github.com/greggman/better-unity-webgl-template
